text: @CDCDirector What’s the plan for widespread testing? The states need federal help with PPE, swabs & reagents for testing. The feds need to coordinate rather than interfere with supply chains. Trump needs to stop using life-saving supplies as rewards to states that are loyal to him. #COVID19
